headline: $11.88 Bn Semiconductor Cleanroom Markets - Global Forecast to 2030 with Daifuku, MURATA MACHINERY, Exyte Group, DuPont, and Thermo Fisher Scientific Leading
summary: The global semiconductor cleanroom market is projected to grow significantly, reaching USD 11.88 billion by 2030 with a CAGR of 8.0% from 2025. This growth is driven by the demand for advanced contamination control in shrinking device geometries and high-tech environments, like EUV lithography and 3D NAND. The cleanroom infrastructure & systems segment was the largest in 2024, crucial for maintaining critical environments. Fan filter units are expected to witness the fastest growth due to rising
